channel.title: enterprise boards on Argolon Solutions
channel.description: Recent content in enterprise boards on Argolon Solutions

item.title: Student Enterprise Winners
item.description: We’ve been doing some work recently for the County and City Enterprise Boards and have been finding out about the Student Enterprise Awards. I am so incredibly jealous of today’s teenagers, I would have loved to be involved in something like that in school. Approx 12000 students take part every year and some great ideas bubble to the top every time. They just had the 2008 awards ceremony last week and Banagher College from Co.
